<Text: Come Poop With Me is a CD of adult-oriented comedy and songs released by Triumph, the Insult Comic Dog (also known as voice actor and puppeteer Robert Smigel) on Warner Bros.>

Text: Come Poop with Me:  Its title is a parody of the Frank Sinatra album "Come Fly With Me".
